item.title: The song of the kwa kwara, or korhaan malkop
item.summary: The song sung by the korhaan malkop, or kwa kwara (also known as the bustard, the black koran or Eupodotis afra). It sings of the Early Times when its head was burnt in the fire.
item.comments: 1) See The kwa kwara, or korhaan malkop and The story of the Kwa-kkwara and The Korhaan marries his elder sister (the Anteater's laws), 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
